title: Nvidia and Abu Dhabi institute launch joint AI and robotics lab in the UAE
description: The joint research hub is the first Nvidia AI Technology Center in the Middle East, TII said in a statement, combining its multidisciplinary research with the U.S. company's AI models and computing power, which are fuelling a global artificial intelligence boom.
content:

title: UK models launch petition to protect likeness from AI misuse
description: The British Fashion Model Agents Association (BFMA) has launched a petition titled “My face is my own”, calling for stronger protections against the unauthorised use of model likenesses by artificial intelligence technologies.
content:

title: More Britons view AI as economic risk than opportunity, Tony Blair thinktank finds
description: TBI says poll data threatens Keir Starmer’s ambition for UK to become artificial intelligence ‘superpower’
content:
Nearly twice as many Britons view artificial intelligence as a risk to the economy than regard it as an opportunity, according to Tony Blair’s thinktank.
The Tony Blair Institute warned that the poll findings threatened Keir Starmer’s ambition for th... [3416 chars]

title: Is AI impacting your career or life plans? Has its rapid rise got you rethinking your future? The ABC wants to hear from you
description: Whether you’re a student halfway through a degree or a mid-career manager planning the next five years, artificial intelligence (AI) is reshaping lives across the country. If you've been feeling its effects, the ABC want to hear from you.
content:
Is artificial intelligence (AI) impacting your job, career, or future plans? Do you have thoughts or concerns about the pace of technological change and where it might all be heading?

title: Nissan revamps ProPilot to rival Tesla's driver-assist technology
description: The next version will be able to take on complex city streets using fewer cameras and monitors thanks to artificial intelligence software.
content:
Nissan Motor is on a mission under new CEO Ivan Espinosa to rebuild its business, and while refreshing its lineup is a key part of that, so is winning back customers who demand cutting-edge technology.

title: US Crackdown On H1-B Visa To Fast-Track AI Adoption, Believes Former Tech Mahindra CEO
description: Former Tech Mahindra Chief Executive C.P. Gurnani has said the US government's move to increase fees for H-1B visa to $100,000 won't hurt Indian IT companies and may even benefit the industry in the long run. Speaking to NDTV Profit, Gurnani expects the crackdown on H-1B visas will eventually lead to a faster adoption artificial intelligence in the industry while adding that Indian IT companies are not body shopping anymore.
content:

title: 0G Labs Launches Aristotle Mainnet With Largest Day-One Ecosystem for Decentralized AI
description: 0G Labs has officially launched its Token Generation Event (TGE) and Aristotle Mainnet, marking a milestone in its mission to make artificial intelligence a public good. Backed by over 100 partners including Google Cloud, Chainlink, Coinbase Wallet, Binance Wallet, and Ledger, the network transitions into full production after surpassing performance benchmarks on Testnet V3. The Aristotle Mainnet integrates decentralized storage, compute, and data availability into a modular Layer-1, enabling verifiable AI execution and powering a new AI-native economy designed for global accessibility and innovation.
